channel.title: Pk Zone
channel.description:
Hey everyone
how would i turn edge into a pk zone and keep the bank as a safe zone?

item.title: Pk Zone
item.dc:creator: @mrbad23 mrbad23
item.description:
@mrbad23 wrote:

ok thanks i still dont understand the cord system could you add the cords to this code for pking at edge

public boolean isInYanille() {
if(absX > 2583 && absX < 2729 && absY > 3255 && absY < 3343) {
return true;
}
return false;
}


Maybe ask for someone to explain it more than to ask them to do it for you?
if(absX > 2583 && absX < 2729 && absY > 3255 && absY < 3343) { - This is what you need to look at.
For the absX > 2583 && absX < 2729 && absY > 3255 && absY < 3343 the boolean is true anywhere above the x coord 2583 and lower than the x coord 2729 as long as the y coord is above 3255 and lower than 3343

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Zone
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Dude…
Really?
Just change the values to the correct ones.
Again, I’m not here to spoonfeed.
Think of it like a box:
if(absX > SMALL_X_VALUE_HERE && absX< LARGE_X_VALUE_HERE && absY > SMALL_Y_VALUE_HERE && absY < LARGE_Y_VALUE_HERE ) {

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Zone
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:551597”]That kind of proves to me that you haven’t attempted it…
Because after 5 minutes of googling (Not ever), I got these:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/372849-pi-yanille-pk-zone.html
You can do what he did, but with your custom coords

Then just add a second boolean for just in the bank.
If they are in the bank AND the pk zone, or just in the bank, do not allow them to PK.
If they are in just the pk zone, allow them to PK[/quote]

ok thanks i still dont understand the cord system could you add the cords to this code for pking at edge

public boolean isInYanille() {
if(absX > 2583 && absX < 2729 && absY > 3255 && absY < 3343) {
return true;
}
return false;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Zone
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That kind of proves to me that you haven’t attempted it…
Because after 5 minutes of googling (Not ever), I got these:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/372849-pi-yanille-pk-zone.html
You can do what he did, but with your custom coords

Then just add a second boolean for just in the bank.
If they are in the bank AND the pk zone, or just in the bank, do not allow them to PK.
If they are in just the pk zone, allow them to PK

Read full topic

Ok i have attempted || (absX >= 2542 && absX <= 2603 && absY >= 3925 && absY <= 3933)

i wanted to know more information on where abouts i add this and do you have the code for the full of edge to be pk but only safe bank its probably a popular request
